lru_example.cpp

00001 #include "lru_cache.h"
00002 #include <string>
00003 #include <iostream>
00004 
00005 int main(void) {
00006         // Typedef our template for easy of readability and use.
00007         typedef LRUCache<int,std::string> string_cache_t;
00008         
00009         // Instantiate a string cache with at most three elements.
00010         string_cache_t *cache = new string_cache_t(3);
00011         
00012         // Insert data into the cache.
00013         std::string quote_1 = "Number is the within of all things. -Pythagoras";
00014         cache->insert( 4, quote_1 );
00015 
00016         // Fetch it out.
00017         std::cout << cache->fetch( 4 ) << std::endl;    
00018 }
